---
title: GAMs for juvenile proportion 03
---
```{r set_env}
#'load knitr
library(knitr);library(plyr);library(dplyr);library(data.table);library(purrr);library(ggplot2)

#'load model libs
library(mgcv);library(gamm4)

#'suppress all code output but run code
opts_chunk$set(eval = FALSE)
```

```{r load_data}
#'load data.goose.clean
source("dataprep.R")
```

```{r model_juvenile_proportion}

gamm_juvprop = gam(propjuv ~  s(lon) + s(lat) + ti(lon,lat),
            data = geese, family = "binomial")

summary(gamm_juvprop)
```
